code: import{useRef,useState}from'react';import Wizard from'@components/wizard';import{ArrowRight}from'react-feather';import Address from'./steps-with-validation/Address';import PersonalInfo from'./steps-with-validation/PersonalInfo';import AccountDetails from'./steps-with-validation/AccountDetails';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WizardHorizontal=()=>{const[stepper,setStepper]=useState(null);const ref=useRef(null);const steps=[{id:'account-details',title:'Screen Details',subtitle:'Register Your Screen.',content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccountDetails,{stepper:stepper,type:"wizard-horizontal"})},{id:'personal-info',title:'Payment Info',subtitle:'Add Wallet Address',content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PersonalInfo,{stepper:stepper,type:"wizard-horizontal"})},{id:'step-address',title:'Location',subtitle:'Add Screen Location',content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Address,{stepper:stepper,type:"wizard-horizontal"})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"horizontal-wizard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wizard,{instance:el=>setStepper(el),ref:ref,steps:steps})});};export default WizardHorizontal;
